articles.author: Rounak Jain
articles.title: Apple could launch four new Macs powered by the M2 chip in 2022, but don’t expect a larger iMac - Business Insider India
articles.description:
1. Apple could launch four new Macs powered by the M2 chip in 2022, but don’t expect a larger iMac  Business Insider India
  2. Apple likely to launch a new 13-Inch MacBook Pro in March, All we know so far  Kalinga TV
  3. Apple Said to Launch …
articles.content:
Apple is gearing up to launch four new Macs in 2022, powered by the company’s own M2 chip. This includes a MacBook Pro
, MacBook Air, Mac Mini and an iMac, too.
However, iMac fans might have to tem… [+1790 chars]
